name: Exotic Sukuh and Cetho Temples tour
description: We are going to visit the plateau on the slopes of mount lawu, Central Java, where our main destinations located. Sukuh and Cetho are Hindu temples which is so unique and exotic and different from any other temples in Indonesia, you will definitely be curious to see them. We will also visit Grojogan sewu, a hidden waterfall with stunning scenery. During the trip you can also enjoy the beautiful view of mountain, forest, vegetable gardens and another beautiful natural scenery.
